participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and competitive, loves sports and enjoys being active.
participant_1.background: i live in a three storey house. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i am married to a doctor.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and hardworking, enjoys the simple life and has a strong connection to nature.
participant_2.background: i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i work my parents farms. i've a pet cow.

content.text: that's awesome. i play tennis with my husband.
